headline: Did Atmos Energy’s (ATO) Strong Q1, Raised Dividend and Steady Outlook Just Reframe Its Story?
summary: In early February 2026, Atmos Energy Corporation reported past fiscal first-quarter 2026 results showing revenue of US$1,342.59 million and net income of US$402.96 million, while affirming full-year earnings guidance of US$8.15 to US$8.35 per diluted share. The company also announced its 169th consecutive quarterly dividend, increasing the payout to US$1.00 per share, or US$4.00 on an annualized basis, underscoring a long-running pattern of regular cash returns to shareholders. With earnings...

headline: Atmos Energy Dividend Lift And US$26b Plan Put Valuation In Focus
summary: Atmos Energy's Board approved a 14.9% increase in the quarterly dividend, marking the company's 169th consecutive dividend. The company outlined plans to invest about $26b in capital expenditures between fiscal years 2026 and 2030 to support its infrastructure. These updates arrive as regulators and stakeholders continue to focus on safety practices and operational oversight. For investors watching Atmos Energy, NYSE:ATO, the combination of a higher dividend and a defined long term capital...

headline: Atmos Energy Shareholders Approve All 8 Proposals, Elect 12 Directors at Annual Meeting

headline: Atmos Energy Q1 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Atmos Energy (NYSE:ATO) reported fiscal 2026 first-quarter net income of $403 million, or $2.44 per diluted share, as management highlighted operational performance during Winter Storm Fern, continued customer growth, and progress on major pipeline and storage projects.
